remarks: Closure of a group sum in a submonoid.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 3-Jun-2019.)
statement:
gsumzsubmcl.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.c $e |- ( ph -> ran F C_ ( Z ` ran F ) ) $.
gsumzsubmcl.w $e |- ( ph -> F finSupp .0. ) $.
gsumzsubmcl $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum F ) e. S ) $.
